problem_text_cn: 如图,一束光线与水平面成60°的角度照射地面,现在地面AB上支放一个平面镜CD,使这束光线经过平面镜反射后成水平光线,则平面镜CD与地面AB所成角∠DCB的度数等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a beam of light illuminates the ground at an angle of N_0 to the horizontal plane. Now a flat mirror CD is placed on the ground AB, so that the beam of light is reflected by the flat mirror and becomes a horizontal light. Then the degree of the angle between the plane mirror CD and the ground AB ∠DCB is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:∵入射角等于反射角,∴∠1=∠2,∵光线经过平面镜CD反射后成水平光线平行,∴∠2=∠4,又∵∠1=∠3(对顶角相等),∴∠3=∠4,∴∠2=∠3,∵光线与水平面成60°的角度照射地面,∴∠3=60°÷2=30°,∴∠4=30°,即∠DCB=30°．故选:A．
